metadata.name: Fall From Grace
metadata.description:
As an artist with a background in comics I can’t help but to love working with line art, and I feature it heavily in my works.
However, sometimes I like to experiment with different types of render styles, and Fall From Grace was such an attempt.  

This artwork is actually an older illustration of mine from a couple of years ago.
I painted her to test and see if the iPad Pro could be a viable substitute for my usual drawing setup. 
The test was a success as I today use the iPad for almost everything art related.  

PNG 
2480x3100
